ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِى ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلْقَدِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'By Allah! Your mind is still astray.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "By God, you are still persisting in your old delusion."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Surely you are still in your same old craze."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: His people said, "By God, you are still making the same old error".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “By Allah, you are still deeply engrossed in the same old love of yours.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "By Allah! Certainly, you are in your old Dalal (error)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: By Allah, you are most surely in your old error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'By God, thou art certainly in thy ancient error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Those around him) said: By Allah, lo! thou art in thine old aberration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "By God, you still persist in your illusions!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: by Allah! verily thou art in thine old-time error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘By God, you persist in your inveterate error.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "By Allah! truly thou art in thine old wandering mind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "By Allah! Certainly, you are in your old error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By Allah' they said, 'this is but your old illusion'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “By God, you are still in your old confusion.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "By Allah, indeed you are in your [same] old error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:95]   They said, to him: ‘By God, you are certainly in your misguidance, your error, of old’, in your excessive adoration of him, and your [enduring] hope of encountering him [again] despite the length of time [that has passed].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Those around him) said) those of his children who stayed with him and his grandchildren said: (By Allah, Lo! thou art in your old aberration) you are still in your old error concerning Joseph.
